personal.name: Lingampally Venkatesh
personal.title: Software Developer
personal.bio: Passionate Flutter Android App Developer with over 3 years of experience in building cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Firebase. I specialize in crafting production-grade apps with clean architecture, scalable code, and seamless performance.

hero.name: Lingampally Venkatesh
hero.title: Software Developer
hero.subtitle: Creating exceptional mobile experiences with clean code and innovative solutions
hero.description: I specialize in building high-performance Flutter applications that deliver seamless user experiences across Android and iOS platforms. My expertise lies in Firebase integration, state management, and modern development practices.

timeline.title: Started My Computer Science Journey
timeline.description: Began my B.Tech in Computer Science and Cyber Security at DRK College of Engineering, Hyderabad. Started learning programming fundamentals and mobile app development.

timeline.title: First Industry Experience
timeline.description: Joined OSOS Pvt. Ltd. as a Software Developer Intern. Worked on the Sparks social networking app, improved Android performance by 15%, and implemented dark mode functionality.

timeline.title: Flutter Developer at Decrypton
timeline.description: Developed the Winnable fantasy gaming app and TaskMagnet multi-ecommerce platform. Integrated payment gateways, real-time features, and published apps on the Play Store.

timeline.title: Remote Flutter Developer
timeline.description: Worked remotely at Alemeno, building complex Flutter applications with the BLoC pattern. Also created automated web scraping tools and built backend services using Django.

timeline.title: Current Role at StepX
timeline.description: Currently working as a Flutter Developer at StepX, building high-performance apps using Clean Architecture. Integrated Firebase, OCR features, and reduced app release time by 20%.

timeline.title: Continuous Growth Ahead
timeline.description: Focused on expanding my expertise in mobile development, exploring cutting-edge technologies, and contributing to impactful, real-world projects.

philosophy.title: Purpose-Driven
philosophy.description: Every line of code I write serves a meaningful purpose and delivers real value.

philosophy.title: Innovation First
philosophy.description: I embrace new technologies to build tomorrow's solutions today.

philosophy.title: Collaboration
philosophy.description: I believe that great products are built by great teams working toward a common goal.
